message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for a great price of $16,000. I think it will be very valuable for you.
I'm interested in the product, but $16,000 is a bit out of my budget. I'd be willing to pay $10,000 for it.
I understand you're on a budget, Bob. How about we meet halfway at $13,000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $13,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'd be willing to pay $9,500 for the product.
